title: Broken machinery

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Broken machinery is located in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon, right outside the door leading to the Alchemical Hydra. Attempting to investigate the machine will result in the player saying: "This machine doesn't look like it's in working order... I wonder if there's a fixed one, anywhere."

content:
Broken machinery
Released10 January 2019 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNone
LocationKaruulm Slayer Dungeon
OptionsInvestigate
ExamineA broken tool sits upon the table.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID34587

The Broken machinery is located in the Karuulm Slayer Dungeon, right outside the door leading to the Alchemical Hydra. Attempting to investigate the machine will result in the player saying: "This machine doesn't look like it's in working order... I wonder if there's a fixed one, anywhere."

Machinery is the working version, and can be found in the Lithkren Vault, it is used to make Ferocious gloves from the Hydra leather dropped by the Alchemical Hydra. Attempting to use a Hydra leather on the broken machinery will result in the player saying: "I don't think this machine's going to do anything in this state."

The '''Broken machinery''' is located in the [[Karuulm Slayer Dungeon]], right outside the door leading to the [[Alchemical Hydra]]. Attempting to investigate the machine will result in the player saying: "This machine doesn't look like it's in working order... I wonder if there's a fixed one, anywhere." 

[[Machinery]] is the working version, and can be found in the [[Lithkren Vault]], it is used to make [[Ferocious gloves]] from the [[Hydra leather]] dropped by the Alchemical Hydra. Attempting to use a Hydra leather on the broken machinery will result in the player saying: "I don't think this machine's going to do anything in this state."
